Type:
Price: 13.99

Pals #39 This Colorful Rainbowface and monochromatic Mr. Gray socks pair is part of the Opposocks Artist Series designed by Nate Bear. We don’t have to match to be besties! Let’s create a friendlier world. This pair comes with a #39 collectible PalsCard! On each card, kids can name their new Pals and learn how they met. Collect all pairs in this series!

  • No-Skid Grips for Safety for ages 1-3 and 4-8
  • 76% Cotton, 22% Nylon, 2% Polyester Spandex
  • Standard weight (Not as heavy as medium weight socks but just as strong)!
  • Super stretchy, comfy socks kids love!
  • No Holes Forever – Guaranteed! (or we replace them for free)
  • Machine wash cold, tumble dry low for optimal care

entry.title: Bubble Whoosh Passionfruit/ Purple NEW!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Buckets of Fun
Type:
Price: 15.99

A skin-friendly, moisturizing foaming bath powder packed with ingredients known for their beneficial effect on skin. 100% GMO-free, vegan, gluten-free and non-toxic – no parabens, chemicals, phthalates, SLS or any known nasties. Coloured and scented Bubble Whoosh uses FDA approved food and cosmetic grade scents and colours.   Each bag will give you 10-12 baths.   

Passionfruit Scented and purple coloured foaming bath powder

Ingredients: Sodium Bicarbonate, corn starch, collodial oats*,sodium laurly suffoacelate (lathanol), coconut oil*, essential and frangrance oils, FD and C colours

*organic

​
